item.description:
If we update configuration when applications are running, we should restart our applications to use updated configurations. Refreshing configuration allow to refresh configurations at run time.

Refresh configuration is good for a little amount of microservices. it may not be convenient for important projects

A single call with bus refresh, will refresh all webservices
